name: Strikecraft
desc: This vehicle depends on larger ships for support, maintenance, and long-range travel. Enables docking at ships larger than Frigates by %s.

name: Strikecraft(Frigate)
desc: Used in tandem with strikecraft hullmod to maintain frigate hullsize in cmbat.

name: Specialized Service Bays
desc: Ships with the %s that dock aboard this vessel refit %s faster.

name: Module Repair
desc: Shouldn't be visible.

name: Cataphract Assault Pods
desc: Enables the %s ability during ground invasions.

name: Advanced Optics(AA)
desc: Extends the range of beam weapons by %s, but reduces their turn rate by %s. Cumulative with Integrated Targeting Unit. Cannot be built-in.

name: Cataphract LSM
desc: Cataphract Land Space Mechs are multipurpose warmachines that combine land and space combat capabilities, to varying degrees of efficiency.
short: %s resistance to EMP, reduced damage taken to weapons and engines by %s, %s missile fire rate, increases ground op strength by %s  .

desc: Cataphract Land Space Mechs are multipurpose warmachines that combine land and space combat capabilities, to varying degrees of efficiency.
short: %s resistance to EMP, reduced damage taken to weapons and engines by %s, %s missile fire rate, increases ground op strength by %s  .

name: Anti-Beam Coat
desc:
Obsolete defensive measure against beam weaponry.

Several layers of this semi-transparent coating protect from beam weapons by reflecting certain wavelengths of light, effectively reducing beam damage by %s.

While the Phase Damper Field is active, effect is augmented to provide a %s reduction.

name: Anti-Beam Plating
desc:
Obsolete defensive measure against beam weaponry.

Several layers of this semi-transparent coating protect from beam weapons by reflecting certain wavelengths of light, effectively reducing beam damage by %s.

This type of coating can only be applied to specialized forms of armor, thereby making it incompatible with %s.

name: Cataphract Complement
desc: This vessel carries lances of Cataphract LSMs. These units can actively participate in ground operations, increasing their effective strength by a value up to the number of marines in the fleet.

name: No Venting
desc: Disables active venting

name: Leg Engines
desc: Prevents engines from being visible while legs are attached.

name: Core Block System
desc: This vehicle is composed of multiple modular components that enhance its combat performance. Destruction of these modules will result in an overall loss in speed in manuverability, as well as these extra systems granted.

name: Karma Counter
desc: Counts Karma for ship system

name: Karma Counter [C]
desc: Counts Karma for ship system

name: Greater Reduced Explosion
desc: Counts Karma for ship system

name: Modular Mobile Armor
desc:
This vessel is modular in nature; the core unit houses the pilot and support staff and is equipped with additional modules that grant bonuses during battle.

Leg modules area equipped with %s suited for point-defense. 

On standard models, The backpack modules house %s. 

Modules %s, and %s.

%s, where applicable.

name: SERAPH
desc: Armor is increased by %s standard units, and %s increase in speed and maneuverability. Exceptionally well-tuned energy systems increase flux throughput and capacity by %s over standard examples of this hull.

name: SILVERSWORD
desc:
A specialized combat support suite governed by an (allegedly) delta-level AI core which excels in precision strikes. Small non-missile weapons automatically target missiles and ignore flares, and damage against missiles and fighters is increased by %s.

This system is equipped with a manual safety override that can be tripped to forcibly disable all limiters during combat - the hull is %s

Due to limited space, %s.

name: SILVERSWORD [Type A]
desc: A specialized combat support suite featuring an experimental piloting system.

name: C-Stim Dispatcher
desc: Installs equipment to administer combat stims directly to the pilot.

name: WINGCOM SUITE
desc: An assortment of electronics and other equipment that allows the vessel to facilitate the coordination of a specialized strikecraft wing. Can only be installed on Strikecraft or carriers larger than frigates.

name: OVERLORD SUITE[ALPHA]
desc: Enables a sufficiently powerful AI Core to remotely control the ships unmanned fighters. Can only be installed on Strikecraft or carriers larger than frigates.

name: OVERLORD SUITE[BETA]
desc: Enables a sufficiently powerful AI Core to remotely control the ships unmanned fighters. Can only be installed on Strikecraft or carriers larger than frigates.

name: OVERLORD SUITE[GAMMA]
desc: Enables a sufficiently powerful AI Core to remotely control the ships unmanned fighters. Can only be installed on Strikecraft or carriers larger than frigates.

name: BODY: COUNTER SHIELD
desc:
Core modules are the heart of the machine, storing vital components such as the cockpit and serving as the central core for other components. Cores can be changed to better suit the pilot's preferences, but only at a spaceport with proper facilities.  

The %s utilizes a specialized omnidirectional shield emitter that accumulates energy from any attacks against it while deployed. Capacity scales with the units flux reserves, and can readily be weaponized in suitable circumstances.

%s

name: BODY: FRAG SHOTGUN
desc:
Core modules are the heart of the machine, storing vital components such as the cockpit and serving as the central core for other components. Cores can be changed to better suit the pilot's preferences, but only at a spaceport with proper facilities.  

The %s is a relatively standard core unit, featuring a built-in weapon that can effectively eliminate small targets within its meagre firing arc, as well as doubling as a close-range assault weapon. While it lacks any kind of gimmick like other Cores, extra space that would be reserved for those systems is used for additional ammo storage and a slightly enhanced central thruster.

%s

name: BODY: ENERGY BLASTER
desc:
Core modules are the heart of the machine, storing vital components such as the cockpit and serving as the central core for other components. Cores can be changed to better suit the pilot's preferences, but only at a spaceport with proper facilities. 

The %s possesses an extremely powerful yet flux hungry built-in particle cannon with limited ammo.

%s
